name: Hill Car Drag Racing
description:
HILL CAR DRAG RACING offers you a unique drag racing experience with hill climb competition featuring different racing cars, stunning graphics and addictive gameplay.

RACE FOR TROPHIES
Drag race against 3 opponents and win. Only the 1st place is rewarded by trophies. You will need them to challenge bosses.

UPGRADE YOUR CARS
Upgrade engine, suspension, wheel and other parts to give your racing car better performance. A better and faster racing car brings more victories and trophies.

BEAT THE BOSSES
Challenge bosses by paying entry fee. Defeat them to earn their racing cars.

HINTS
- Only 1st place is rewarded by trophies.
- A well-timed gear down gains more speed on uphills.
- Purchase upgrades as soon as you have enough currency.
- You need trophies to unlock bosses.
- Defeat bosses to earn their racing cars.
- You a nitro per race, use it wisely.
- Every boss unlocks 300 new levels.
- Upgrade booster to earn more coins and stars.
- Upgrade pressure to gain more grip.
- Upgrade magnet to reach coins and stars placed at higher positions.
- Prizes of mystery box depends on the levels you reached. the higher level the bigger prizes.
- Mystery box helps you out if you have currency problem.
- Try to use your nitro at different places if a level causes you a trouble.
- 4th place gives you nothing. try to reach better position.
- You have to be 1st to unlock next level.
